user.title: Create Utility Meter
user.description: Create a sensor which tracks consumption of various utilities (e.g., energy, gas, water, heating) over a configured period of time, typically monthly. The utility meter sensor optionally supports splitting the consumption by tariffs, in that case one sensor for each tariff is created as well as a select entity to choose the current tariff.

data_description.always_available: If activated, the sensor will always be show the last known value, even if the source entity is unavailable or unknown.
data_description.delta_values: Enable if the source values are delta values since the last reading instead of absolute values.
data_description.net_consumption: Enable if the source is a net meter, meaning it can both increase and decrease.
data_description.periodically_resetting: Enable if the source may periodically reset to 0, for example at boot of the measuring device. If disabled, new readings are directly recorded after data inavailability.
data_description.offset: Offset the day of a monthly meter reset.
data_description.tariffs: A list of supported tariffs, leave empty if only a single tariff is needed.

reset.name: Reset
reset.description: Resets all counters of a utility meter.

value.name: Value
value.description: Value to which set the meter.
